summary: This is an email chain from September 23, 2019, forwarding a tip to an unspecified recipient (likely a journalist or investigator) regarding a person described as a former pilot for Bill Clinton. The tip suggests this individual may be connected to the Jeffrey Epstein scandal and provides personal background, including that he is the father of a National Security Adviser.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Central figure in sex trafficking scandal
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of the scandal to which the tip about a potential associate (a pilot) might be connected.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Mentioned as the employer of the alleged pilot who is the subject of the tip.

persons.name: Berman
persons.role: Intended recipient of the tip (likely a reference to then-U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman)
persons.context: The tipster requests the email be forwarded to Mr. Berman, suggesting he is a law enforcement official who should investigate the alleged pilot.

persons.name: W P
persons.context: The individual sending the initial tip, claiming to be an abandoned child of the alleged pilot and offering information about his potential connection to Epstein and Clinton.

connections.description: The tip alleges the unnamed individual was a pilot for Bill Clinton.
The tip suggests the pilot may be involved in the Jeffrey Epstein scandal, warranting investigation of his flight manifests and lifestyle.
W P claims to be one of the pilot's abandoned children.
The tip states the pilot's son is a National Security Adviser.

events.title: Tip email regarding Clinton pilot
events.description: An email tip is sent and forwarded, alleging a former pilot for Bill Clinton may be a sexual predator with potential connections to the Jeffrey Epstein scandal.

keyFacts: A tipster (W P) claims to have information about a sexual predator who was a pilot for Bill Clinton.
The tipster suggests this pilot may be involved in the Jeffrey Epstein scandal and that his flight manifests and lifestyle deserve investigation.
The tipster identifies as one of the pilot's abandoned children and states the pilot's son is a National Security Adviser.
The tipster notes the pilot changed both his first and last names when obtaining a work permit and residency.
The email is intended to be forwarded to Mr. Berman (likely then-U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman) for investigation.
